samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example demonstrates the types (flat, toogle, outline, round), sizes and styles (primary, success, info, warning) of the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 button.

samples.name: Button Group
samples.description: This example demonstrates the behaviors (default, checkbox, radio) of the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 ButtonGroup.

samples.name: Checkbox
samples.description: This example demonstrates the three different states (checked, unchecked, indeterminate) of the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 CheckBox.

samples.name: Radio Button
samples.description: This example demonstrates the group functionality of the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 RadioButton with checked and unchecked states.

samples.name: Dropdown Button
samples.description: This example demonstrates the usecases of the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 DropDownButton with icons, text and separator in popup action items.

samples.name: Split Button
samples.description: This example demonstrates the usecases of the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 SplitButton with icons and text in primary splitbutton.

samples.name: Switch
samples.description: This example demonstrates the toggle states (checked, unchecked) of the Syncfusion JavaScript ES5 Switch.

samples.name: Progress Button
samples.description: This example demonstrates the different functionalities of the Syncfusion Javascript ES5 ProgressButton with spinner and progress indicator.
